answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat

answers.answer: We have participated in the GG22 OSS round - Developer Tooling and Libraries: https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/42161/609/19
answers.question: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds

answers.answer:
Iggy is an open-source framework that makes it easy to create Web3 Social apps, like how Wordpress helps build websites. 

It solves the problem of building social dApps from scratch by offering ready-made modules, like chat, token swaps, and NFT launchpads, that developers can add or change as needed. 

This saves a lot of time when setting up Web3 Social sites, and many DAOs and web3 communities are already using it.
answers.question: Provide a brief overview of your tool, library, or framework. What specific problem or inefficiency in the development process does it address?

answers.answer:
The Iggy framework is open-source and completely free to use, helping developers save time and enabling web3 communities to easily launch their own social dApps.

Some of the communities that use the Iggy framework are the Degen token community, Mode Network community, Flare community, Superposition community, etc. Here are a few examples:

- SGB Chat (web3 community chat): https://sgb.chat/ 
- NFT Degen (social NFT launchpad): https://nftdegen.lol/ 
- Degen Radio (social music playlists): https://degenradio.lol/ 
- MeowNFTs (social NFT launchpad): https://meownfts.com/
answers.question: How does your project reduce development barriers, improve efficiency, or enhance the security of Web3 projects? Please provide specific examples or metrics if available.

answers.answer:
Iggy has been used in 10 different dApps so far:
- SGB Chat: https://sgb.chat/
- FLR Chat: https://flr.chat/
- Modechat: https://modechat.xyz/ 
- NFTdegen: https://nftdegen.lol/
- Scrolly Hub: https://scrollyfi.xyz/  
- Always Liquid: https://alwaysliquid.com/ 
- BasePunk NFT community: https://chat.basepunk.xyz/ 
- MeowNFTs: https://meownfts.com/
- Satraps Forum: https://forum.satraps.io/ 
- Degen Radio: https://degenradio.lol/
answers.question: Describe the current usage and support for your tool within the developer community. This could include GitHub stars, downloads, or testimonials from developers.

answers.answer: Our roadmap focuses on developing new features based on user requests and helping communities set up their own Web3 Social dApps using the Iggy framework. We allocate funds to support our growth, allowing us to stay independent without relying on VC funding.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Iggy - Web3 Social Framework
project.description:
Think of Iggy as “Wordpress for Web3 Social”. A web3 framework that lets you easily set up a Web3 Social app for your community.

**Open Source and Free**

Iggy is completely free to use! The code is open source and available on GitHub:

- Frontend code: https://github.com/iggy-social/iggy-social-frontend 
- Smart contracts: https://github.com/iggy-social/iggy-contracts 

The Iggy framework includes many useful plugins that go beyond just a social app, such as a token swap module, NFT launchpad module, Send Tokens module, etc. 

These modules are all optional and developers can decide on their own which ones to use (or even develop new ones). 

**Where is it used**

Some of the communities that use the Iggy framework are the Degen token community, Scrolly Web3 community, Songbird & Flare community, Mode Network community, BasePunk NFT community, Superposition community, etc.

Here are a few of them:

- SGB Chat (web3 community chat): https://sgb.chat/ 
- NFT Degen (social NFT launchpad): https://nftdegen.lol/ 
- Degen Radio (social music playlists): https://degenradio.lol/ 
- MeowNFTs (social NFT launchpad): https://meownfts.com/

**Impact**

The impact of Iggy as a low-code web3 framework is to save developers a ton of time launching a Web3 Social site for any DAO or web3 community. 

From our experience so far, developers and communities are loving this tool, and we expect the usage of Iggy to grow much more in the near future.

**Links**

- Website: https://iggy.social/ 
- X/Twitter Account: https://x.com/IggySocial 
- GitHub Organization: https://github.com/iggy-social
